title: Logical Positivism, Postmodernism and the IDW with Liam Bright
description:
Liam Bright is a prof at the London School of Economics, and he walks me through the logical positivist movements as it relates to postmodernism, and shares his insights into the phenomena of the IDW movement. We also touch on grievance studies and critical race theory

Listen to podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Logical-Positivism--Postmodernism-and-the-IDW-with-Liam-Bright-e90hcf 

Follow Liam on twitter @lastpositivist, follow me @AndreaLynnLewis
Email me: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com

Link Liam mentioned
https://www.pewresearch.org/fact-tank/2018/05/08/most-americans-want-to-limit-campaign-spending-say-big-donors-have-greater-political-influence/
